DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to establish the therapeutic range of ANT-1207 in the treatment of primary axillary hyperhidrosis.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial To Evaluate ANT-1207 In Subjects With Primary Axillary Hyperhidrosis
